name: Knightwoode
overview: Knightwoode is a text adventure of immense proportions created by Tony and Emma Kingsmill and David Nagle in AMOS under the banner of Tony Kingsmill Software Designs. The beautiful vale of Knightwoode was once a peaceful place until the construction of a mysterious castle, that is when the trouble began. The evil castle dwellers were quick to give their orders. Villagers that ignored them paid the ultimate price. A brave rebel, Fastflow September led an attack, but their farm tools were not match for the armored soldiers. For many years there seemed to be no hope... then the village nominated you to clean up the evil crenellated Coldrock Castle urging that you might find your father Fastflow, in the dungeons.
